headline: Ohio Senate race poll: J.D. Vance, Tim Ryan in close race as concerns about economy boost GOP
author: Haley BeMiller
sentences: Vance and Democrat Tim Ryan are neck and neck just weeks after winning their primary races, according to a USA TODAY Network Ohio/Suffolk University poll released Wednesday.
Vance was the favorite with 41.6% of voters, but Ryan trailed closely behind at 39.4%.
Grab your popcorn, Ohio: The U.S. Senate race could get interesting.
